column1: The '''New Reckoning''' was the calendar system introduced in [[Gondor]] shortly after the [[War of the Ring]] and intended to replace the [[Stewards' Reckoning]]. Its chief feature was that the year began on the anniversary of the destruction of the Ring.<ref name="D2">{{App
* The [https://psarando.github.io/shire-reckoning Shire Reckoning] project, dedicated to simulations and detailed analysis of all the calendars of ''The Lord of the Rings'' [[Appendix D]].
